summary: Branding updates to “QuickBazar” were applied in TopNav, index.html metadata, and manifest name/short_name, and the header logo reference was switched to /assets/generated/quickbazar-logo.dim_512x512.png. However, the manifest still contains the word “marketplace” in its description, and the diff does not provide evidence that the required icon PNG files themselves were regenerated/replaced.

missing_requirements.requirement: frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest uses “QuickBazar” for name/short_name and does not mention “ShopHub” or “Marketplace”.
missing_requirements.reason: Although name/short_name are updated to “QuickBazar”, the manifest description still contains the word “marketplace,” which conflicts with the acceptance criterion stating it should not mention “Marketplace”.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace/regenerate the existing PWA icon image files (pwa-icon.dim_192x192.png, pwa-icon.dim_512x512.png, pwa-maskable.dim_512x512.png, apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png) with newly generated QuickBazar-branded icons while keeping the same filenames/paths.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows manifest and service worker referencing these icon paths, but no binary/image file changes are included in the provided diff summary, so replacement of the actual PNG assets is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker caching logic updates including new CACHE_NAME ('quickbazar-v1') and precaching of generated assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on renaming branding and generating/replacing logo and PWA icons; it does not request modifying service worker caching behavior or cache naming.

hallucinated_features.description: Offline fallback HTML page branded/styled with “Offline - QuickBazar” and a custom UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: Updating/adding an offline page experience was not requested in the BuildRequest requirements (REQ-14/15/16).
